editorialDecl.p: Data in the sourceDesc of the header comes from a pre-AACR2 record. Other data follows AACR2 when applicable.
sourceDesc created by exporting from catalog on 2008-06-15.

This electronic text file was created by optical character recognition (OCR). No corrections have been made to the OCR-ed text and no editing has been done to the content of the original document. Encoding has been done using the recommendations for Level 1 of the TEI in Libraries Guidelines.
Line breaks and column breaks have not been encoded, but page breaks have.
All hyphens and quotation marks have been retained.
